fields.name: Martyr's Gambit
fields.description: +400 Health +100% Base Health Regen +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Active: Binds yourself to target champion for the next 3 seconds, redirecting 60% of all damage dealt to them to yourself (30 second cooldown). ''Battle is not a test of strength. It is a test of will.'' - Buhru Proverb
